hackathon-description-text: This is a hackathon that is geared primarily towards KNOLSKAPE employees (Knollies), however, registrations and submissions are open to all who want to create the future of learning.
hackathon-eligibility: The Hackathon is primarily geared for KNOLSKAPE Employees. All KNOLSKAPE Employees can register for the hackathon with their KNOLSKAPE email address.
hackathon-requirements:
Themes - under the bigger umbrella of learning and assessment
 Team Rules:
To enter a submission as a team, every member of the team must create a DevPost account. The team lead will create the submission by filling out the online submission form. The submission creator can enter the DevPost usernames (or email addresses used to sign up on DevPost) of the teammates into the "Team Member" section of the submission form. Once this has been done, the team members will be added to the submission.
hackathon-rules:
General rules of 
 for the Hackathon applies.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: One Fitbit Charge 2 HR for every individual of the team.
One Kindle Paperwhite for every individual of the team.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How creative, inventive, or novel is the solution?
How well have you implemented the idea?
Clarity about idea, market, road map etc.
Quality of demo presentation to judges
How well-defined & thought-through is the user engagement?
